scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && npm install --include=dev --no-optional && npm install @rollup/rollup-linux-x64-gnu --no-save && ROLLUP_SKIP_LOAD_NATIVE_PLUGIN=1 npm run build
scripts.test: (cd frontend && npm test) && (cd backend && pytest tests/)
scripts.pylint: docker-compose run --rm backend sh -c 'cd /app && ruff check --fix /app & pylint --rcfile=/app/.pylintrc .'
